title: 508A.08 APPLICATION; LAND INCLUDED.
text:
Any number of tracts of land in the same county owned by the same person may be included in one application.
Owners of separate tracts of land in the same county may join in one application to register the title to their individual tracts. The application must list separately all of the information required by section 508A.06 for the owner or owners of each of the tracts included in the application.
